name: Overgrowth Valley
description:
It's time to start your new life as a farmer in Overgrowth Valley!

Scientists in Overgrowth Valley have developed a new fertilizer which causes plants to grow incredibly fast. You must take advantage of this to earn money and pay your bills, while avoiding letting the plants grow out of control and destroy your farm.

Created by Liam Harwood as part of Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2020.
